articles.title: Naomi Osaka's brutal response to question about Serena Williams - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: Naomi Osaka gave a four-word response to a question about Serena Williams after her Australian Open triumph.
articles.content:
Naomi Osaka gave a four-word response to a question about Serena Williams. Image: Australian Open
Fans are calling it, tennis greats are predicting it. Just don't ask Naomi Osaka if she's the new Se… [+3147 chars]
